Uses of Package
uno.anahata.asi.tool

Packages that use uno.anahata.asi.tool
Package
Description
uno.anahata.asi.model.tool
Defines the model-agnostic domain model for the tool (function) calling subsystem.
uno.anahata.asi.model.tool.java
Provides the concrete domain model for tools implemented as Java methods via reflection.
uno.anahata.asi.swing.chat.tool
 
uno.anahata.asi.tool
Provides the core framework for defining, managing, and executing local Java tools.
uno.anahata.asi.toolkit
 
uno.anahata.asi.toolkit.files
 
uno.anahata.asi.toolkit.shell

    Manages the lifecycle of all AI tools, including registration, configuration, and lookup.

  • Classes in uno.anahata.asi.tool used by uno.anahata.asi.toolkit
    Class
    Description
    AiTool
    Marks a method as an AI-callable tool and provides essential metadata.
    AiToolkit
    Marks a class as an AI-callable toolkit and provides essential metadata.
    AiToolParam
    Provides a description for a parameter of a method marked with AiTool.
    AnahataToolkit
    An optional, abstract base class for toolkits that provides a rich, context-aware API for tool execution, similar to a Servlet or EJB.
    HandyToolStuff
    The base class for Java code generated by the AI model.
